# Ghibli AI Generator

> A free online tool that transforms ordinary photos into Studio Ghibli-style artwork using AI technology, with no registration required.

## Core Content
- [Image Generator](https://ghibliaigenerator.io/#generator): Transform your photos into Ghibli-style artwork
- [Video Generator](https://ghibliaigenerator.io/#generator): Convert your photos into Ghibli-style short videos
- [Gallery](https://ghibliaigenerator.io/#examples): View beautiful examples created with our AI generator

## Common Resources
- [Usage Guide](https://ghibliaigenerator.io/#how-to): Step-by-step guide on how to use our Ghibli AI generator
- [Features](https://ghibliaigenerator.io/#features): Learn about the powerful features of our AI generator
- [FAQ](https://ghibliaigenerator.io/#faq): Frequently asked questions about our Ghibli AI generator

## Latest Updates
- [Multiple Style Variations](https://ghibliaigenerator.io/#features): Updated April 2023
- [High-Quality Transformations](https://ghibliaigenerator.io/#features): Updated April 2023
- [Mobile Responsive Design](https://ghibliaigenerator.io/#generator): Updated April 2023
